question: You child is going on a school trip overseas for week. The Headmaster is looking for parents to join the trip. Write a letter to state that you would like to join it. In your letter:•	Mention why you would like to join the trip.•	Ask some general questions about the trip.•	Mention how you can be helpful.
text: I am writing this letter with regard to the upcoming school trip to Los Angeles. Also, I would be delighted to join this trip to accompany my son.

To being with, I am fond of travelling and exploring new places and Los Angeles is in my bucket list for a long time. Moreover, I can keep an eye on my kid and other children to make sure they are safe.
Apart from this, I would like to know the itinerary . Also, please share the details of accommodation, refreshment facilities and the measures followed by the school to ensure children’s safety.

Moreover, I can help you to organize this tour, as I worked for a tourism company before and have organized a few successful trips. Besides that, I can plan some fun activities  to keep the kids entertained throughout the travel. Also, I have a friend who works in Disneyland and can help us to get a huge discount on the entry fee.
I hope my suggestion will be taken into consideration and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
